title: Uncle Murda interview and more
itunes:title: Uncle Murda interview and more
description:
12/19- Today on the show we had Leonard Grant, also known as Uncle Murda stop by, where he spoke about his unlike with Lavar Ball, claims Mase is going to hell and more. Moreover, we flashed back to when legendary comedian Dave Chappelle stopped by and spoke about his fan base, being non apologetic and more. Also, we flashed back to when Charlamagne gave himself "Donkey of the Day" for once being part of "rape culture." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
